tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
quoteText: you agree that you will be solely responsible to Comcast for all activities that occur under your Comcast Web Services accounts, including the activities of any individual with whom you share your Comcast Web Services account or an Activated Device, and will be responsible for any breach of these Terms caused by these activities.
